programs.title: Programs We Offer
programs.subtitle: Integrated Program Overview: Software Programming, Embedded Systems & Robotics. Our flagship program integrates Software Programming, Embedded Systems, and Robotics into a single, comprehensive, industry-aligned curriculum. Students gain both the software and hardware competencies required to build real-world digital and intelligent systems.

software.title: Software Development Foundations
software.description: Students build strong programming and problem-solving skills through modules such as: Web and mobile application development, UI/UX design principles, Databases and data management, Cloud foundations and deployment basics, Industry-standard tools and software engineering practices.

embedded.title: Embedded Systems & IoT
embedded.description: Learners gain hands-on experience working with: Microcontrollers and microprocessors, Internet of Things (IoT) systems, Electronics fundamentals, Sensor integration and circuit design, Automation and real-time systems.

robotics.title: Robotics & Intelligent Automation
robotics.description: The program blends mechanical, electronic, and programming skills to teach: Robotics foundations and design, Actuators, sensors, and control systems, Mechanical prototyping, Algorithmic and autonomous decision-making, Intelligent and automated system development.

about.whoWeAreDesc: NGA-Coding Academy is a private high school and emerging Centre of Excellence dedicated to developing exceptional talent in Software Programming, Embedded Systems, and Robotics. Our mission is to provide high-quality, competency-based training that prepares students to thrive in Rwanda’s growing digital economy.
about.visionDesc: To shape future-ready careers by delivering excellence in software engineering, embedded systems, and robotics.
about.missionDesc: To provide high-quality, competency-based training in Software Programming, Embedded Systems, and Robotics; to nurture innovation through industry-aligned curricula; and to develop entrepreneurial, job-ready graduates who uphold Christian values while contributing to Rwanda’s digital transformation and the global tech ecosystem.
